title: Kan Lalpa tan thawktu an awm em
lyrics:
Kan Lalpa tan thawktu an awm em,
Kan zingah hian? Kei heta hi ka awm e,
A rawnghawlin ka kal zel ang.

Lal Krista aia palai kan ni (2)
Krista hmingin rawng kanbawl zel ang khawvelah;
Min chhandam tawh avangin.

Krista ka tana inpetu tan,
Thih ni thlengin rinawmin chatuan thlengin,
A rawngbawlin ka kal zel ang.

Aw, thian duhtak, Isua Krista tan,
A aiawhin nung ve la Khawvel sualah;
A rawngbawlin i kal zel ang.

He khawvelah Lalpa tan thawkin,
Ka kal zel ang ropuinaa chhun enin;
Ropui chunga ropui zelin.

Aw, mihring hlui, hmanah chuan i tan,
Ka nung thin a, tunah ka thihsan ta che;
Kumkhua atan ka then ta che.
